bill_title: make an appropriation for improving the social and economic viability of South Dakota and to declare an emergency.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to make an appropriation for improving the social and economic viability of South Dakota and to declare an emergency. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of $1 to the state, for purposes of improving the social and economic viability of South Dakota. Section 2. The state shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by shall revert in accordance with the procedures prescribed in chapter 4-8. Section 4. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
